arStrings.szText:
{c_label}Cooldown: {/c}{c_resource}{Cooldown Time}{/c} seconds
Raheir throws his shield, dealing {if:SF_7}{c_number}{payload:DAMAGE}{/c}{else}massive{/if} Physical damage and Taunting enemies for {c_number}{SF_5}{/c} seconds. The shield bounces up to {c_number}[{SF_3}-1]{/c} times and cannot bounce to the same target twice.
